Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="cc10a181d2ce410584dd0558c850a22a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]有了，有了。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
这就是“[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]发光巢穴[System:Color name="Default"]”啊。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7b03b2c3d0404e25921a7646aaa6453e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]到了早上，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]它会产出能作为
药材使用的[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]精华[System:Color name="Default"]。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7b03b2c3d0404e25921a7646aaa6453e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]不过，发光巢穴受到伤害后[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
便会损坏，无法产出精华。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7b03b2c3d0404e25921a7646aaa6453e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]所以我希望你们能[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]一直保护[System:Color name="Default"]发光巢穴[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]直到天亮[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="555516ad9c1146bd834b643da40d66d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]哎呀⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
好像有什么东西？
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_03_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1df53c4295de442780e600deac9e6d8f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]这小家伙之前没有出现过呢。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
去观察一下它吧。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_04_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="de9193d148cf48e8b857fc7283fe9776" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Talk"/]咦？数量增加了。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
这难道是⋯⋯
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_05_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3e9512b38864476a8ead87340c78d3b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]果然，这小家伙应该是[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
新种类的皮克敏。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3e9512b38864476a8ead87340c78d3b0" Scale="1"/]身体会发出微光⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
那就叫它“[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]发光皮克敏[System:Color name="Default"]”吧。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_06_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="46359dd88d774420948749ad22268b99" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]呵呵呵，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]它好像很喜欢你呢。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="46359dd88d774420948749ad22268b99" Scale="1"/]那正好，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]你就和这小家伙一起
保护发光巢穴吧。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_07_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="499ef1b79972477e92a149b21861128c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]另外，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]刚才那个星形碎片[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
就叫它“[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]发光沛蕾特[System:Color name="Default"]”吧。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="499ef1b79972477e92a149b21861128c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]把它搬到发光巢穴，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
增加发光皮克敏的数量吧。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="499ef1b79972477e92a149b21861128c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]那么，好好加油吧。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart2nd_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ec24aedce1c74ff69faae5348ecbe88c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call04" lipsync="0"/]呵呵呵，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]关于发光皮克敏，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
我又有了新发现哦。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart2nd_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6df0326816914b95b2c963a9aec8abdc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]发光皮克敏[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
能够发出强光。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6df0326816914b95b2c963a9aec8abdc" Scale="1"/]用[PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_X_Button" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/]的话，发光皮克敏会聚集起来，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
变成一个光球。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6df0326816914b95b2c963a9aec8abdc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]将那个能量一次性释放出去的话，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
就能变成“[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]闪光爆裂[System:Color name="Default"]”！[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6df0326816914b95b2c963a9aec8abdc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]如果将那个光照向原生生物，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
它们就会因为过于耀眼而畏惧不前，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart3rd_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="15cda8ec4572484f9cab37714c5c56c0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call04" lipsync="0"/]啊——啊——[etc:Wait frame="8"/]能听到吗？[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]⋯⋯[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="15cda8ec4572484f9cab37714c5c56c0" Scale="1"/]其实，为了应对今后可能发生的护送任务，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
我在很久之前教给了[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]欧庆[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]一项技能。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart3rd_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6cba517ad3424624bb6cd5fbfa1d088f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]选择你想保护的发光巢穴，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
并向[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]欧庆[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]发出请求。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6cba517ad3424624bb6cd5fbfa1d088f" Scale="1"/]然后[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]欧庆[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]会在[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]发光巢穴附近巡逻[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
一旦有原生生物靠近，它便会上去撕咬！[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6cba517ad3424624bb6cd5fbfa1d088f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command" lipsync="0"/]在晚上的探索时，[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]欧庆[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]离开队伍后，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
便会在[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]原地待命并展开巡逻[System:Color name="Default"]。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6cba517ad3424624bb6cd5fbfa1d088f" Scale="1"/]你们可要好好配合，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
保护好发光巢穴！
Night.Night_HowToDualPhotonHill_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9156698240224c93a5db1e2f6bbba815" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call04" lipsync="0"/]嗨，新人，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
能听见吗？[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9156698240224c93a5db1e2f6bbba815" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]在今晚的据点附近，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
有[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]2个发光巢穴[System:Color name="Default"]。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9156698240224c93a5db1e2f6bbba815" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]如果能保护好它们直到早上，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
就能采集[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]2个发光之蜜[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_HowToDualPhotonHill_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="155f57fa2c254fb5aa49a55af9f0485c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]如果我的推测没错，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]这2个发光巢穴[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
在地下应该是连通着的⋯⋯[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="155f57fa2c254fb5aa49a55af9f0485c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]如果[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]一方遭到破坏[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
那两边就都无法产出发光之蜜了。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="155f57fa2c254fb5aa49a55af9f0485c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]不过你一人无法同时保护2个发光巢穴，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
让[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]欧庆[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]也来帮忙吧。
Night.Night_HowToPhotonBall_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b422b1143d1a48cb8b7237380f1bc893" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call04" lipsync="0"/]之前在晚上获得的“[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]发光种子[System:Color name="Default"]”，[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
我已经把它放到包包里去了。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b422b1143d1a48cb8b7237380f1bc893" Scale="1"/]现在我来教你使用方法。
Night.Night_HowToPhotonBall_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4382a27fb32f4722a78ed2fa9b71d771" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]首先，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]从包包中
选择发光种子⋯⋯[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4382a27fb32f4722a78ed2fa9b71d771" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]然后投掷种子，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
这样就能[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]生出发光皮克敏[System:Color name="Default"]了。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4382a27fb32f4722a78ed2fa9b71d771" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]不过它们只会出现在[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]晚上[System:Color name="Default"]或者[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]洞窟[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_AppearanceDodoro_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4eaae3b4d6ae4fa49062eea758d0afee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]呜哇⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="8"/]好可怕的原生生物⋯⋯[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4eaae3b4d6ae4fa49062eea758d0afee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion/]那个眼睛⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="8"/]它好像[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]正朝着发光巢穴走来[System:Color name="Default"]。
Night.Night_AppearanceDodoroCave_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="81fba741fa6942c69e3910f8a8ff8921" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]呜哇⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
我有一种不祥的预感⋯⋯[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="81fba741fa6942c69e3910f8a8ff8921" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]无法预料它的行动⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
请务必小心！
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e7026956b4024d7f8fceb959d681eabd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]呵呵呵，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]差不多了。
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6151d3c1253748999d8220f7c29fa2b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]夜间，凶暴化的原生生物[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
会被光芒吸引。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6151d3c1253748999d8220f7c29fa2b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]它们会[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]朝着发光巢穴前进[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
注意别让发光巢穴被破坏啊。
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2e76ecce2e4b44f6b878b020475395f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]啊，它们已经出动了！
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_Pic01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7631a81b5d154c778f1cb360a1b35301" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]总之，收集[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]发光沛蕾特[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
增加[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]发光皮克敏[System:Color name="Default"]的数量⋯⋯
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_Pic02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3622317787ab47b494587f6a1c17d33d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]在黎明到来前，[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]打倒不断袭来的[System:Color name="Default"][etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]原生生物[System:Color name="Default"]就行了。
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c997a77214384ed19fa50d67c14c6229" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/][Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]、[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]欧庆[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
就拜托你们了啊！
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightBrokenWasurena:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2e95582a93a74f2ab8c4e4737b85ab45" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]⋯⋯哎呀，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]发光巢穴被破坏了。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
怎么办啊⋯⋯
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightBrokenWasurena_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e7cbdf75b60b4734a9a071e8a1e7c7a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]真可惜啊。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
不过，下次再加油吧。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUp:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b5280ef646274ba2bfd60cba2a847993" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]呼⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="8"/]终于成功
保护了发光巢穴。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUp_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6e329c560fec4cdfb87306f0a53e0d66" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]太好了！[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
成功保护了发光巢穴，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUp_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="da29510751d348b59370bcc92ededd58" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]辛苦了。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
那么，带上发光种子回去吧。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUpMax:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2f126c0410d84f0f89d36a4b8c67e21d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]竟然打败了所有的原生生物，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
好厉害，新人！
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUpMax_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ac9585ba0cd24df9847ad6e3ab5523b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]哇啊，好厉害！[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
原生生物全都不见了。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUpMax_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a7f7394f491c45b9bffef0c3819ec595" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]那么，一共获得了[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
多少发光种子呢，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_InGame_OtoriWorking:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="718c5d7ad7a14596b0afaff16ce489c8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]⋯⋯哎呀？[etc:Wait frame="15"/]还能把发光沛蕾特
搬运到这里呢。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="718c5d7ad7a14596b0afaff16ce489c8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]看它的外观，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
说不定是发光巢穴的幼体。
Night.Night_InGame_OtoriWorking_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="90ae7f2d33144a5390b4e4e6dc21df3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]如果是这样的话，它在地下[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
和发光巢穴是互相连通的吗？[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="90ae7f2d33144a5390b4e4e6dc21df3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]看来[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]搬运[System:Color name="Default"]远处的[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]发光沛蕾特[System:Color name="Default"]时，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
还能用来当[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]中转站[System:Color name="Default"]啊。
Night.Night_InGame_OtoriWorking_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="aa562e01942b44d6a602f2ce90a6ab43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]而且，还能用它来[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]吸引原生生物[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
保护发光巢穴。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="aa562e01942b44d6a602f2ce90a6ab43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]虽然个头较小，但也有好好发光，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
就叫它“[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]诱饵巢穴[System:Color name="Default"]”吧，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_InGame_OtoriWorking_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f72562dabbf04dcaa5f77b40ca712ce1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]好，那就试着将它作为[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]诱饵[System:Color name="Default"]或[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]中转站[System:Color name="Default"]来使用吧！
Night.Night_InGame_FirstInvasionWasurenaNight:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9208efaae1084b00ad8fbeb50330ad47" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Night_FirstInvasionWasurenaNight01"/]不好，不好了！[etc:Wait frame="15"/]

就采集不到[Carrot:Hikarinomistu/]了。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9208efaae1084b00ad8fbeb50330ad47" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Night_FirstInvasionWasurenaNight02"/]快去把原生生物赶走！
Night.Night_InGame_NightEndGetPhotonBall_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c62043e20c504953817384a97c133c6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]发光皮克敏来为你送行了。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c62043e20c504953817384a97c133c6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]难道，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]它们想和我们一起去

Night.Night_InGame_NightEndGetPhotonBall_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="48b8b8833b09483abf6ce981d7aa68f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]⋯⋯哎呀？[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
发光皮克敏变成[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]种子[System:Color name="Default"]了。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="48b8b8833b09483abf6ce981d7aa68f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]呵呵呵，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]好想仔细调查一下啊。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
你能把它们带回来吗？
Night.Night_InGame_PhotonZenmetu_00:
